title: Failing CS 240 but need CS 577 to graduate - what do I do?
comments: 577 is like a way much harder version of 240 to me. So if you're failing 240rn, 577 is gonna give you a much much harder time
🧍‍♂️how have you made to your final year in college without taking CS 240? That’s one of the CS breadth courses which should be taken earlier in college as a prerequisite for other CS courses.
Talk to your advisor, you might have to take 577 over the summer, as it’s usually offered there
